snippet: Felix will not be able to attempt an Olympic double in Rio, but a 16-year-old became the youngest member of the United States Olympic track team since 1972....
abstract: Allyson Felix expresses disappointment after finishing fourth in 200-meter final, failing to earn 2016 Olympic spot in event; Sydney McLaughlin, one of Felix's biggest fans, finishes third in 400-meter hurdles to become youngest member of United States Olympic track team since 1972.
lead_paragraph: Felix will not be able to attempt an Olympic double in Rio, but a 16-year-old became the youngest member of the United States Olympic track team since 1972.

headline.main: Allyson Felix Falters, but a Teenage Star Rises
headline.print_headline: Felix Falters at U.S. Trials, but a Teenage Star Rises
